problem_text_cn: 如图,AD∥BE∥CF,直线m,n与这三条平行线分别交于点A,B,C和点D,E,F,已知AB=5,BC=10,DE=4,则EF的长为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, AD ∥ BE ∥ CF, straight line n and these three parallel lines intersect at points A, B, C and D, E, F respectively, it is known that AB = N_0, BC = N_1, DE = N_2, then EF The length is ()
raw_comment: 本题考查的是平行线分线段成比例定理,灵活运用定理、找准对应关系是解题的关键．
